text:
Huge apology for not addressing that earlier. I am working with the exec team to position what we are about rather than what we are not. 

The feeling is that we absolutely need to take a strong stand, but be deliberate in outlining our views/stance regarding diversity and working actively to broaden views vs. narrow them.

As an example: point out that the political climate has focused, very clearly, on narrowing to echo one's beliefs. Uncorked decidedly doesn't do that.
